FuncDef:
The label-free delay command configures the delay in releasing obtained labels.
The undo label-free delay command cancels the the delay in releasing obtained labels.
By default, the delay in releasing obtained labels is configured to 5 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a delay in releasing obtained labels.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 180, in seconds.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In a EVPN FRR switchover scenario,to prevent this problem, run the label-free delay command on Device B to configure a delay in releasing obtained labels (deleting ILM entries).
